items.title: Beware of AI-generated clips shared as footage of Texas floods
items.summary: People are sharing AI-generated clips as footage of Texas floods, misleading others. The videos are not actual footage of the deadly July 2025 flooding.

items.title: NATO Just Funded A British Startup That Says Its AI Tech Can Spot Deadly Bio Threats Before They Spread—Even The Ones We Didn't Know Existed
items.summary: NATO has funded a British startup, Portal Biotech, claiming to have developed AI technology to detect deadly bio threats before they spread, including unknown ones. The funding is part of a $35 million Series A round led by the NATO Innovation Fund.
